page.title: 17OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is near the main road. On the other side of the road is our Spar shop. Our school is called{Glenravel {Primary School. }In school we get work every day and homework every night. There are five teachers, who teach us every day.{Master McQuillan}is the head master. He teaches Primary Seven,{Mr. Totten}teaches Primary six,{Mrs. Graham}teaches Primary five,{Mrs. Miskelly}teaches Primary four and three and{Miss McNeill}takes two and one. We get dinner in school at half past twelve and play time is after dinner. We get play time up to five past one. The Primary ones and twos gets out at five past two and the rest of us gets out at five past three. Some of us travel on a{school {bus}and the rest they walk or else a car comes for them.
